DOC.brief_summary: The study sought to assess the rate of recurrent stroke and death in stroke patients with a patent foramen ovale randomized to treatment with warfarin or aspirin. This was a multicenter study conducted at 48 U.S. Institutions.
DOC.brief_title: Patent Foramen Ovale in Cryptogenic Stroke Study
